about_the_game:
Gear up for victory with the Rifleman Starter Pack! Power up your arsenal with a top-tier Golden weapon, 1500 Kredits and special boosters that increase your XP and in-game earnings. Ready to dominate the battlefield? Grab your pack today!

The pack includes:

  • 1500 Kredits
  • Golden Cobalt Kinetics EDGE Rifle
  • VIP Booster (30 days)
  • Mega VIP Booster (30 days)
